articles.title: Scouted: Forget After-Shave, Guys—Stop Ingrown Hairs in Their Tracks With These Post-Shave Products Instead
articles.summary: Nivea offers a sensitive post-shave balm as a drugstore option. Kiehl's provides the Ultimate Razor Burn & Bump Relief lotion, known for preventing ingrown hairs. Claus Porto presents the Musgo Real After-Shave Balm for those seeking a sophisticated, old-school experience. SheaMoisture produces an after-shaving cream catering to Afro-textured hair. Jack Black offers a Post Shave Cooling Gel with mint balm for a tingly feeling.

articles.title: The Frooti case study: How nostalgia and innovation shaped an FMCG Icon
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Frooti revolutionized the mango drink category in India through taste-led innovation and memorable branding. The company pioneered aseptic packaging and used real mango pulp to create a quintessential mango drink. Frooti established itself as a favorite by embedding itself in childhood memories.

articles.title: I've Sunk Countless Hours Into Finding The Best Products On TikTok: Here Are 39 Standouts
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder, offering a matte and radiant complexion. Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream, hydrating with glycerin and aloe, while exfoliating with salicylic acid. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash, enriched with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for nourished skin.

articles.title: Lenovo unveils full portfolio of AI-powered devices across consumer, business, mobile
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: Lenovo is introducing a range of new products designed for the AI era, including AI-ready workstations, handheld gaming devices, creator tablets, and moto ai-enabled smartphones. These products aim to redefine the capabilities of technology for both individuals and businesses.

articles.title: TVS Motors pins hope on a festive market bonanza
articles.author: Mahesh Kulkarni
articles.summary: TVS Motor launched upgraded vehicles as part of efforts to attract new customers. This indicates a refresh of existing models with improvements or new features.

articles.title: Studio t Launches Performance-Driven Creative Design Services
articles.author: Studio t
articles.summary: Open Fortune's Performance-Driven Creative Design Services provide clients with creative assets aligned with real-world marketing and digital applications. The creative services include brand strategy, website and e-commerce design, campaign and content strategy, and graphic and motion design.

articles.title: You can buy Samsung's Galaxy S25 FE for only $6 a month - how the ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: AT&T is offering a 66% discount on Samsung's latest midrange handset for both new and current customers. This promotion highlights a collaboration between the two companies related to a specific Samsung product.

articles.title: The elegance of movement in Silksong
articles.author: theahura
articles.summary: Team Cherry launched "Silksong", a new video game and sequel to Hollow Knight. The game is known for its high difficulty and focus on precise movement, which is described as a core element of the gameplay experience. The game is targeted towards perfectionist gamers.

articles.title: THE POWER OF A CONNECTED BRAND: HOW UNITING CREATIVITY, DATA, AND TECHNOLOGY CREATES EXTRAORDINARY CREATIVE EXPERIENCES
articles.author: Sat Articles
articles.summary: Digitas has rebranded, integrating creativity, data, and technology into a unified ecosystem to provide seamless, client-centric lifecycles. This rebrand is exemplified by their work with Sho't Left, where a personalized campaign using consumer preferences increased booking inquiries by 44% by creating a seamless path from the very first click.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord Buds 3r first impressions: Affordable and feature-packed
articles.author: Arghanshu Bose
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its Nord Buds 3r TWS earphones in India, priced at Rs 1,599 (introductory). These earbuds feature a compact design, 12.4mm dynamic drivers, Bluetooth 5.4, AI noise cancellation, and a claimed 54-hour total playtime. They are designed for everyday use in calls, music or gaming.

articles.title: Hydro X5 Pressure Washer Reviews And Complaints-❌(( REALLY WORKS? ))❌The Eco-Friendly Way to Power Wash Your World!
articles.summary: The Hydro X5 Pressure Washer is a tool for efficient cleaning, featuring adjustable high pressure output, ergonomic design, and multi-functional nozzles. It requires correct assembly, nozzle selection, and adherence to safety protocols. The Hydro X5 is compatible with various detergents such as Multi-Purpose Cleaners, Vehicle Cleaners, Concrete or Brick Detergents, and Wood Cleaners to achieve the best cleaning results.

articles.title: Hydro X5 Pressure Washer Reviews-(❌MY HONEST EXPERIENCE!❌)-Is This the Best Pressure Washer for Home Use?
articles.summary: The Hydro X5 Pressure Washer is a portable, cordless cleaning device marketed under the Turbo Jet brand. It transforms a water source into a high-pressure cleaning tool with a rechargeable battery and interchangeable nozzle system. While not as powerful as traditional pressure washers, it's suitable for light cleaning tasks and offers convenience in locations without power outlets.

articles.title: Hydro X5 Pressure Washer-((⛔💥BIG SURPRISE!💥⛔))-'Hydro X5 Pressure Washer: Built for Durability and Performance!
articles.summary: The Hydro X5 Pressure Washer is introduced as a versatile tool for outdoor cleaning. It features a powerful motor delivering up to 4000 PSI and is designed with adjustable settings for various surfaces, making it suitable for tasks ranging from cleaning driveways and decks to washing vehicles. It also comes with a 5-year warranty.

articles.title: Galaxy Z TriFold: Samsung Hints at Foldable's Launch Date
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch its new tri-fold phone, likely called the Galaxy Z TriFold, by the end of the year. The initial launch will be limited to select markets as Samsung gathers user feedback. This phone is designed to enhance productivity with its large screen, allowing for better multitasking and potentially replacing laptops for some users.

articles.title: From Home Kitchen to Pantang Plant: How Emigoh is scaling Ghanaian manufacturing
articles.summary: Emigoh Ghana Ltd. has launched a new manufacturing plant in Pantang to triple its yoghurt production capacity. This expansion aims to challenge imported brands and increase local manufacturing capabilities. The new facility features automated production lines to meet growing demand, creating more skilled job opportunities.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold software updates: How many will it get?
articles.author: Roydon Cerejo
articles.summary: Google is launching the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a new flagship foldable phone. It features improved durability with an IP68 rating, Pixelsnap wireless charging using Qi2, a Tensor G5 chip, and a gearless hinge designed to withstand over 10 years of folding. Pre-orders are available now, with open sales beginning October 9, 2025, and prices starting at $1,799.

articles.title: Dazl launches with $10M seed, Pioneering the Next Wave of Market-Ready Applications
articles.author: The Facts
articles.summary: Dazl, an AI creation platform, is introduced for building high.

articles.title: First Drive: Polestar 5 takes brand into the ultra-luxury GT world
articles.author: James Batchelor
articles.summary: Polestar is launching the Polestar 5, an electric four-door GT car. The Polestar 5 sits on a completely brand new, scalable bonded aluminium platform and has new battery and 800-volt charging technology. It comes in Dual Motor (737bhp, 416 miles range) and Performance (871bhp, 351 miles range) versions with prices starting from £89,590 and £142,900, respectively.

articles.title: 7 Years In The Making, Sans Ceuticals Founder Lucy Vincent Is Disrupting The Hair Care Category With Perpetual
articles.author: Ashleigh Cometti
articles.summary: Beauty entrepreneur Lucy Vincent launched Perpetual, a waterless haircare innovation. This product aims to redefine sustainability and design within the haircare industry.

articles.title: I visited an LG smart cottage and it felt like the future
articles.author: Rebecca Carey
articles.summary: LG has introduced the LG Smart Cottage, a compact living space integrated with LG's smart home appliances and controlled via the ThinQ app. Features include the LG Tumble Dryer (VX700) with AI Dry, transparent fridge door and colour changing ThinQ InstaView refrigerator and energy-efficient technologies like solar panels and the Therma V™ Monobloc air-to-water heat pump. Currently sold on a B2B basis in South Korea, LG plans to expand sales to the US and European markets.

articles.title: From Patients To Consumers: Direct-To-Consumer Pricing As A Model For Healthcare Reform
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Eli Lilly is implementing direct-to-consumer pricing for its product, Zepbound. This initiative aims to offer a more transparent and consumer-focused exchange regarding pricing.

articles.title: Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra: $800 Off!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, positioning it as a primary computing device with a 14.6-inch display, redesigned S Pen, and Galaxy AI tools. The launch promotion includes free storage upgrades, trade-in credits, and a Roblox incentive, targeting 'prosumers' and highlighting AI integration and metaverse capabilities.

articles.title: The next big thing in Israel's hi-tech scene?
articles.author: Israel National News
articles.summary: Dazl, an AI creation platform, has launched with $10 million in seed funding led by 40RTY Fund, with participation from Wix and its co-founder Nadav Abrahami. The platform aims to provide product makers with the precision and reliability needed to turn ideas into real software, bridging the gap between creative intent and the final working product.

articles.title: CATL launches the world's first LFP battery with 470+ miles range and 10-minute charging
articles.author: Peter Johnson
articles.summary: CATL launched its new Shenxing Pro battery, the world's first LFP battery boasting over 470 miles of driving range and ultra-fast 10-minute charging. The new battery is safer, features a record-breaking lifespan, and promises lower costs and is now the fastest-charging battery in Europe.

articles.title: Meet The Most Powerful 911 Ever Built: The New Turbo S
articles.author: Jim Gorde
articles.summary: Porsche has launched the new 911 Turbo S, featuring a T-hybrid powertrain. The system generates a combined 701 hp, enabling a 0-60 mph acceleration in 2.4 seconds and a top speed of 200 mph. Order books have opened in Germany starting at €271,000.

articles.title: The Top 5 Nextiva Alternatives for 2025
articles.author: Faithe Day
articles.summary: Several companies offer alternatives to Nextiva, each with its unique strengths. RingCentral offers an all-in-one UCaaS platform and AI features. Dialpad focuses on artificial intelligence, Zoom Phone delivers unified communication, Ooma provides a budget-friendly option for small businesses, and GoTo Connect is oriented towards providing the best customer experience.  These alternatives cater to a variety of business needs with different features and pricing.

articles.title: I visited an LG smart cottage and it felt like the future
articles.author: Rebecca Carey
articles.summary: LG introduced a smart cottage at its Smart Park in Changwon, South Korea, showcasing its latest smart home appliances. These appliances are integrated with the LG ThinQ network and controlled via the ThinQ app, offering personalized home automation features.

articles.title: Creepy or Fun? Vodafone's New Spokesperson Is AI, Not a Real Person
articles.author: Omar Gallaga
articles.summary: Vodafone is testing a new advertising approach using an AI character as its spokesperson. This AI character has already appeared in Vodafone's social media advertisements.

articles.title: Boyd Has Delivered 5 Million Liquid Cold Plates to Hyperscalers through Reliable, High-Volume Global Manufacturing, Advancing AI Data Center Liquid Cooling Technology
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Boyd has delivered five million liquid cold plates to hyperscalers. These cold plates are designed for AI processor liquid cooling systems in high-performance AI compute and data center architectures. Boyd ensures the durability, quality, and longevity of its liquid cold plates through in-line thermal and flow performance testing.

articles.title: Dazl launches with $10M seed, Pioneering the Next Wave of Market-Ready Applications
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dazl, an AI creation platform, has emerged from stealth with $10 million in seed funding led by 40RTY Fund and Wix. The platform combines AI with tools for human creativity, aiming to empower entrepreneurs and designers to build production-ready applications. Assaf Sagy, TikTok's former Global Head of Gaming, will join as CEO.

articles.title: Making laundry easier on rainy days
articles.summary: LG is offering the 8/5KG Front Load Combo Washer Dryer with AI DD, featuring 'TurboWash' technology for quick wash cycles and AI-driven fabric care. They also offer the 12KG Top Load Washing Machine with Inverter Direct Drive Motor, equipped with 'TurboDrum' and 'Smart Motion' for powerful dirt removal. Both models are compatible with 'LG ThinQ' for remote control via smartphone.

articles.title: Skoda Vision O Concept Previews An Octavia Wagon So Good You'll Forget SUVs
articles.summary: Skoda's next-generation Octavia utilizes VW's SSP platform and incorporates Skoda's Modern Solid design language. This represents a new product introduction from Skoda.

articles.title: Pwani Oil Unveils Innovative Sawa Lotion Range Amidst Sustained Strategic Diversification into Personal Care
articles.author: Soko Directory Team
articles.summary: Pwani Oil has launched its new range of Sawa Lotions after a USD 4.5 million investment into its personal care product line. The Sawa Lotions come in four variants and are available in leading retail outlets across Kenya, targeting the growing demand for quality personal care products and the emerging Gen Z demographic.

articles.title: 30 cool last-minute tech gifts for the home that suit every kind of budget
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new tech products aimed at enhancing home life. Anker provides affordable wireless chargers and multi-port USB hubs, while iRobot offers the Roomba 675 robot vacuum for automated floor cleaning. Other innovative products include the Philips Wake-Up Light Alarm Clock, the Furbo Dog Camera and the Google Nest Hello Wi-Fi Video Doorbell, addressing various consumer needs.

articles.title: Split Ends Don't Stand a Chance Against My Repairing Hair Routine
articles.author: Danielle Jackson
articles.summary: Olaplex is highlighted for its bond-building capabilities, effectively repairing damaged hair as a pre-wash treatment. Redken offers a product that softens and conditions tightly-coiled hair prone to dryness and breakage. The article also mentions various hair masks, oils and serums that adress damage and split ends.

articles.title: Qubrid AI Launches Startup Accelerator Program with Up to $100,000 in GPU Cloud Credits, Premium AI/ML Tools, and Expert Mentorship
articles.author: Qubrid
articles.summary: Qubrid AI has launched its Startup Accelerator Program. This program is designed to provide AI startups with the infrastructure, tools, and expertise necessary to scale innovation quickly. The program targets early-stage and growth-stage AI startups.

articles.title: Qubrid AI Launches "Become a GPU Cloud Provider in Weeks" Program, Enabling Neoclouds, MSPs, ISPs, OEMs, Resellers and IT Solutions Providers to Rapidly Enter the GPU Cloud Market
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Qubrid AI launched the "Become a GPU Cloud Provider in Weeks" program, offering a turnkey platform for organizations to enter the GPU cloud market quickly. The program features options for rebranding, integrating existing GPUs, and full customization. Dihuni has also launched its GPU Cloud Platform powered by Qubrid, providing on-premise customers with rapid access to GPU resources.

articles.title: New Marmite flavour is spotted on UK supermarket's shelves – but shoppers are VERY divided
articles.author: Caron McKinlay
articles.summary: Marmite launched a new Caramel Sauce flavor at Marks and Spencer, dividing shoppers. Terry's Chocolate Orange introduced a caramel flavor available at Co-op and Iceland, also generating mixed reactions. Cadbury launched a new Bournville bar with hazelnut and salted caramel, a Dairy Milk Iced Latte flavor, and a White Dipped Twirl, while Mars brought back White Chocolate Maltesers.

articles.title: Neura Robotics Says Consumer Robots Coming Soon
articles.author: Berivan Kilic
articles.summary: Neura presented its 4NE1 robot, designed for laundry sorting, at IFA 2025. The company aims to introduce consumer-affordable robots in the near future.

articles.title: McDonald's adds 'game-changing' item to menu in 'first ever' for fast food chain
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: McDonald's launched a new Sausage Sandwich on September 10th as part of its Saver Menu across the UK, marking the first time breakfast is included on the Saver Menu. The sandwich features an RSPCA assured pork sausage patty in a soft bun, available from £1.99 or as a bundle with a drink for £2.99.

articles.title: Troubled Polestar EV Brand Launches Luxury Sedan
articles.author: Michael Taylor
articles.summary: Polestar has revealed its Polestar 5, a five-seat sedan with dual electric motors and sustainable materials. It features an Android Automotive operating system, Bowers & Wilkins sound system, and a range of up to 670km. The Polestar 5 incorporates an 800 Volt electrical architecture, enabling 350kW DC charging.

articles.title: Entries Open For Cussons Baby Moments Season 7
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: Cussons Baby, a PZ Cussons brand, has announced the commencement of Season 7 of its 'Cussons Baby Moments' competition, featuring a N2 million grand prize. This announcement was made at a recent press briefing at the company headquarters.

articles.title: This bestselling Amazon vacuum is 73% off — here's why reviewers call it a 'game-changer'
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Amazon Canada is offering a discounted Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, now available for under $150. This vacuum features powerful suction, a 55-minute runtime, an anti-tangle brush, HEPA filters, and an LED flex head, ideal for cleaning various surfaces. User reviews highlight its build quality, lightweight design, and effectiveness on hard floors.

articles.title: Brits 'willing to pay' for mobile car wash services, study reveals
articles.author: George Jones
articles.summary: Clean Me, a mobile car washing service marketplace, has unveiled research on mobile car valeting prices, with the average total valet cost of a small car at £69.98. Prices for an exterior valet range from £34.33-£47.41, while a full valet starts at £115.55 for a small car, showcasing the price points for their services.

articles.title: PZ stakes N2m grand prize for Cussons Baby Moments
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: PZ Cussons, through its Cussons Baby brand, has launched a new season of the 'Cussons Baby Moments' competition. This year's edition includes changes aimed at improving the participant experience and increasing opportunities.

articles.title: Blink Video Doorbell (2nd generation) review: Cheap but not particularly cheerful
articles.author: Jonathan Bray
articles.summary: Blink has launched its 2nd-generation video doorbell with improved video quality and a wider vertical field of view, priced at £60. The new doorbell addresses some shortcomings of the original, such as image quality, but audio quality and build quality remain concerns. It requires a Blink Sync module, costing an additional £10 if one isn't already owned.

articles.title: Genpact Marks Next Phase as Advanced Technology Company with Global Rebrand
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Genpact launched a global rebrand and a new tagline, 'on it,' reflecting a strategic shift towards advanced technologies. This move includes the introduction of agentic AI solutions designed to orchestrate complex business processes autonomously, enhancing client operations. The company also unveiled GenpactNext, its updated growth model supporting this transformation.

articles.title: Rising Star ASTRAUX Shines at IFA Berlin, Accelerates Expansion Across Key EU Markets
articles.summary: ASTRAUX launched three new products at IFA Berlin 2025: the ASTRAUX Mini EV (a micro-electric vehicle), the Aimon Companion Robot (an interactive emotional AI robot), and ASTRAUX Smart Glasses (combining sunglasses, AI translation, and a camera). The company also announced an accelerated expansion into Germany, France, Italy, and Spain, aiming to capture the rising demand for innovative mobility solutions. All products are available for pre-order with limited-time launch offers until December 4.

articles.title: Dreame reports formidable growth in CEE & Nordic Europe
articles.author: Aurel Dragan
articles.summary: Dreame introduced its smart home ecosystem at IFA 2025, featuring 22 product lines including 15 entirely new categories. New product lines include the Aqua Series robot vacuums, the Matrix10 Ultra multi-mop switching robot vacuum, the Cyber X stair-climbing robot, the Cyber10 Ultra robotic vacuum with a grabbing robotic arm, the H15 Mix 7-in-1 wet and dry vacuum, and the A3 AWD series robotic lawn mowers.

articles.title: China's Alibaba releases trillion-parameter AI model to rival OpenAI, Google
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched its new AI model, Qwen-3-Max-Preview, with over 1 trillion parameters. The model is available on Alibaba's cloud-services platform and OpenRouter and features enhancements in Chinese-English text understanding, complex instruction following, and multilingual ability.

articles.title: Tesla's ‘2.5 gen' Optimus humanoid robot stumbles through its first demo
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Tesla unveiled a gold-colored version of its Optimus humanoid robot. The company clarified this gleaming robot as an intermediate upgrade, not a new generation.

articles.title: Wix co-founder Nadav Abrahami launches Dazl with $10M to reinvent app creation with AI
articles.author: Daniel Levi
articles.summary: Nadav Abrahami, co-founder of Wix, is launching Dazl, an AI creation platform designed to improve the building of production-ready apps. Dazl aims to provide creators with tools that interpret prompts more precisely and deliver consistent results, backed by a $10 million seed round led by 40RTY Fund with participation from Wix.

articles.title: McDonald's confirms new breakfast item coming to UK menus
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching the Sausage Sandwich nationwide starting Wednesday, September 10. The sandwich consists of a pork sausage patty in a bun, with optional cheddar cheese and sauces. It will be available on the saver menu for £1.99, or as a bundle with a drink.

articles.title: The Volkswagen ID.Cross delivers the ‘secret sauce' as an affordable, sleek electric SUV
articles.summary: Volkswagen debuted the ID.Cross at the Munich Motor Show. The ID.Cross is an affordable and stylish new electric SUV.

articles.title: 21 Shoes That'll Be Comfortable All Day & Look Good
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Steve Madden offers sandals similar to high-end brands. Fila released platform sneakers with chunky padding. Dr. Martens Rometty boots feature air-cushioned soles. Bjork introduced Maja clogs with a wooden sole. New Balance offers 608 V5 Cross Trainers with minimal seams and foam inserts.

articles.title: A review of Hollow Knight: Silksong
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Team Cherry launched Hollow Knight: Silksong, a single-player Metroidvania action-adventure game. It is available on multiple platforms including PlayStation, Xbox, Steam, and Nintendo Switch. The game introduces new features such as the 'wish' and 'rosary' systems and has a new protagonist, Hornet.

articles.title: Exploring Lynx.ANZ's Blind Date Show: A Whiff of Scented Love💕 on Instagram
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Lynx.ANZ launched an Instagram-based blind date show where participants are matched based on scent profiles using Lynx fragrances. This innovative online dating approach aims to create authentic connections by leveraging the link between fragrance and memory, providing a unique sensory experience.

articles.title: Red Sparrow Digital Expands from Local Success to Global Presence
articles.author: Red Sparrow Digital
articles.summary: Red Sparrow Digital (RSD), a digital marketing agency founded in 2019, is expanding its SEO, web design, content, and social media marketing services to support businesses in international markets. RSD is applying its expertise and strategies to assist global brands in improving online presence in countries like the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, and Australia.

articles.title: The Foldable Smartphone's Next Leap: Redefining What A Phone Can Be
articles.author: Mark Vena
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7, a sophisticated foldable smartphone, features an 8.0-inch screen that folds into a pocketable form, improved build quality, and software integration. It provides a unique user experience through multitasking support and stylus compatibility. Apple is expected to launch a foldable iPhone in 2026, which could reshape consumer expectations and further push the foldable phone industry forward.

articles.title: McDonald's new menu item on sale in all UK restaurants within 48 hours
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A fast food giant is introducing a new breakfast item.

articles.title: RavenDB Launches the First Fully Integrated, Database-Native AI Agent Creator
articles.author: Europa Press
articles.summary: RavenDB has launched its AI Agent Creator, a feature integrated into its NoSQL document database. This allows developers to build AI agents more efficiently, reducing the time from months to days. The AI Agent Creator, now available as part of RavenDB 7.1, supports all LLMs and optimizes costs.

articles.title: rabbit overhauls r1 experience with rabbitOS 2, featuring colorful new card-based design and vibe-coding agentic AI capabilities
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Rabbit has launched rabbitOS 2, a new operating system for the rabbit r1 AI companion device. The update features a card-based design and introduces 'creations,' allowing users to build tools and games by talking to the device. The company also provides free global shipping on r1 orders till September.

articles.title: 32 Products That'll Grant You A PhD In Packing
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Anker provides charging solutions with the Anker charging port for charging six devices and the Anker Nano Travel Adapter for international travel. Gillette offers the on-the-go Gillette razor, and Alleyoop provides a portable travel razor with moisturizing bar and refillable spray bottle. Subtl Beauty offers a Stak to keep up to nine makeup products in one compact and convenient place and newly updated AirFly allows users to seamlessly connect their wireless earbuds or headphones.

articles.title: Samsung S25 Edge now in SA: Is slimness really what people want?
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmed-down flagship smartphone featuring a 6.7-inch screen, advanced AI capabilities, and a price starting at R24,999. The launch is strategically timed to compete with Apple's upcoming thinner iPhone 17. The S25 Edge targets users seeking a sleek, large-screen phone.

articles.title: This Lenovo ThinkPad in white has been on my mind since I tried it at ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The ThinkPad X9 Aura Edition is now available in a new Glacial White color. This new color option enhances the visual appeal of the ThinkPad X9 Aura Edition.

articles.title: I tried Lenovo's rotating display laptop at IFA 2025, and it was a mind-boggling experience
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: ThinkBook is developing the VertiFlex, a proof-of-concept device. This device features a rotating screen that switches between portrait and landscape orientations.

articles.title: Wix co-founder and former TikTok executive raise $10M to transform app creation
articles.author: Meir Orbach
articles.summary: Wix co-founder Nadav Abrahami and former TikTok executive Assaf Sagy launched Dazl, an AI-driven platform designed to help creators build production-ready applications. Dazl emerged from stealth with $10 million in seed funding and aims to bridge the gap between creative intent and finished applications, addressing the shortcomings of existing generative AI tools.

articles.title: AI app platform Dazl emerges from stealth with $10M seed round
articles.summary: Dazl launched a new AI platform designed to enable the creation of production-ready applications. The platform provides more accurate prompt interpretation and maintains context during app development, targeting entrepreneurs, marketers, and designers. Dazl has raised $10 million in seed funding led by 40RTY Fund, with participation from Wix.

articles.title: I tried the super-thin Dyson PencilVac – here are 8 things I loved about it
articles.author: Rachael Sharpe
articles.summary: Dyson has announced the PencilVac, a new vacuum cleaner model, featuring a Fluffycones cleaner head, multi-directional cleaning, and a compact design for accessing small spaces. The PencilVac also includes laser-like illumination, a Hyperdymium 140k motor for strong suction, a dust compressing system, and an LCD screen, and can connect to the app to provide real time maintenance alerts and helpful tips.

articles.title: Xiaomi 16 Pro Max leak suggests next Xiaomi flagship could have secondary display
articles.summary: Xiaomi is preparing to launch the Xiaomi 16 Pro Max smartphone, expected to feature a secondary display on the back, similar to the Mi 11 Ultra. The phone will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset and is anticipated to launch in China by the end of the month.

articles.title: TVS launches NTORQ 150 scooter in Hyderabad
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: TVS Motor Company has launched the TVS NTORQ 150 scooter in Hyderabad, priced at Rs 1,19,000 (ex-showroom). The scooter features a 149.77 cc engine, Race and Street modes, acceleration to 60 kmph in 6.3 seconds, Alexa integration, and live tracking capabilities.

articles.title: Wow! Here's a oddly compelling reason to pick a Pixel 10 over an iPhone 17
articles.author: Tom May
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL are expected to launch with a new 100x zoom feature enhanced by AI algorithms. This feature aims to improve the clarity of distant objects in photographs by generating details that the lens cannot capture, potentially opening up new photographic possibilities. While reviews suggest the AI enhancement works well, it raises philosophical questions about authenticity in photography.

articles.title: Elevate Your Journey with Aspinal's Travel Ready Essentials
articles.author: Sheerluxe
articles.summary: Aspinal of London launched the Travel Ready collection.

articles.title: Persil Non Bio 3 in 1 Washing Capsules - 48 Washes - S&S £7.41
articles.summary: Persil introduces Non Bio 3 in 1 Washing Capsules featuring a biodegradable, plant-based formulation. The capsules offer stain removal without residue, even in quick and cold washes, and are dermatologically tested for sensitive skin.

articles.title: A2Z Cust2Mate Unveils Breakthrough Agreement for Retail Digital Asset Monetization
articles.summary: A2Z Cust2Mate Solutions Corp. has reached an agreement to monetize retail media, data, and digital services on its smart carts deployed at Yochananof supermarkets. This agreement allows A2Z Cust2mate to receive the rights to monetize all retail media, data and other digital assets and services provided on or generated by its smart carts. This transformation from a smart cart solutions provider into a diversified enterprise delivering integrated retail media, big data, and digital services solutions.

articles.title: A2Z Cust2Mate Unveils Breakthrough Agreement for Retail Digital Asset Monetization
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: A2Z Cust2Mate Solutions Corp. has secured the rights to monetize retail media, data, and digital services generated by its Cust2Mate 3.0 smart shopping carts deployed in Yochananof supermarkets. This agreement transforms the smart carts into a platform offering advertising, data, and third-party service capabilities.

articles.title: A2Z Cust2Mate Unveils Breakthrough Agreement for Retail Digital Asset Monetization
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: A2Z Cust2mate Smart Carts are evolving into a platform offering advertising, data, and third-party services. This represents an expansion of the cart's functionality beyond its original purpose.

articles.title: 32 Products To Help You Get Your Life Together
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Maybelline introduces the Dark Circles Treatment Concealer, a lightweight formula infused with Haloxyl, a peptide complex for reducing dark circles. L'Oréal launches a repairing hair treatment that repairs damage and restores shine in just eight seconds. Essence releases a cruelty-free lengthening mascara with rave ratings and is available at under $5.

articles.title: Samsung To Showcase New A-65% Bespoke AI Washer and 2nd Gen Bespoke AI Laundry Combo at IFA 2025
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is launching the new Bespoke AI Washer with A-65% energy efficiency at IFA 2025. They are also introducing the second-generation Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, which includes improvements like increased drying capacity, reduced drying time, and enhanced AI Wash & Dry+ capabilities.

articles.title: McDonald's new menu item on sale in all UK restaurants within 48 hours
articles.author: Robert Rowlands
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new Sausage Sandwich in all UK restaurants starting September 10. The breakfast item features a pork sausage patty, cheddar cheese, and choice of sauce in a soft bun, priced at £1.99 on the Saver Menu. Customers can also get it with a drink for £2.99.

articles.title: Albert Heijn Boosts Food Waste Prevention With New Campaign
articles.summary: Albert Heijn has launched 'Last Chance Bargains,' an initiative integrated into the AH app to reduce food waste. The initiative bundles existing food waste prevention campaigns and offers discounts up to 70% on near-expiration products, aiming to sell 25% more discounted products. Additionally, Albert Heijn introduced Steijn, a new chatbot assistant within the Mijn AH app, to provide conversational responses to cooking queries.

articles.title: OnePlus to drop Hasselblad camera tuning, betting on in-house imaging engine: What it means
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is developing a new imaging engine called OnePlus DetailMax Engine. This engine aims to capture and reveal the world in a more realistic and clear way, moving beyond their partnership with Hasselblad.

articles.title: BMW iX3 vs Mercedes GLC: IAA 2025 Preview & Comparison
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: BMW is launching its 'New Class' platform with the iX3 in 2025, featuring advancements in battery technology and software integration, targeting a range of 800km+. Mercedes-Benz is responding with the GLC Electric, aiming for luxury and comfort in the premium EV market. Both companies are adopting 800V architecture for faster charging speeds.

articles.title: The influencer in this Vodafone ad isn't real
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Vodafone is testing AI in advertising, using an artificially created presenter in a recent ad campaign. The company confirmed it's experimenting with different advertising styles using AI in response to customer queries regarding the presenter's artificial appearance. This initiative reflects Vodafone's exploration of AI's role in everyday life, including advertising.

articles.title: The influencer in this AI Vodafone ad isn't real
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Vodafone is testing AI-generated presenters in its advertising. The company confirmed it was experimenting with AI to create ads, using it as a new approach to advertising. This is not the first time Vodafone has embraced AI in its ads, releasing a commercial last year in which every shot was AI-generated.

articles.title: New to Idaho, this drive-thru coffee chain likes to play dirty. Ready, Meridian?
articles.author: Michael Deeds
articles.summary: Ziggi's Coffee is expanding to Meridian, Idaho, and constructing a drive-thru location.  They are known for innovative beverages, including coffee, energy drinks, smoothies, and dirty sodas. The company recently introduced limited-time offerings like the Mike's Hot Honey Latte and the OMG! (Oh My Gourd!) dirty soda.

articles.title: OnePlus ditches Hasselblad in favor of its own DetailMax Engine camera system
articles.author: Gareth Bevan
articles.summary: OnePlus will debut the OnePlus DetailMax Engine, a proprietary computational photography platform designed to push smartphone image clarity and realism. The DetailMax Engine focuses on capturing more detail and depth without artificial over-processing, ensuring photos hold up to closer inspection when zoomed in. CEO Pete Lau is personally testing prototype hardware with promising results.

articles.title: How Do You Smell a Perfume Online?
articles.summary: Creed introduced a new scent last year. Khadlaj launched 'Cream Velvet', described as a dupe for Giardini di Toscana's 'Bianco Latte'. Escentric Molecules released 'Molecule 01', promoted for its unique interaction with skin chemistry, and several new perfume brands mentioned Memo Paris launched 'Madurai', Fugazzi launched 'Orange Crush', Ormonde Jayne launched 'Levant', Louis Vuitton launched 'Imagination', and Parfums de Marly launched 'Carlisle'.

articles.title: LG Electronics Likely To Launch Rs 15,000-Crore IPO In October 2025: All You Need To Know
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: LG Electronics is planning to launch an issue in October, awaiting market conditions to stabilize.

articles.title: Domino's in NI takes on KFC with new chicken concept
articles.author: Henry Saker-Clark
articles.summary: A pizza delivery giant is launching its new Chick 'N' Dip sub-brand initially across the north west of England and Northern Ireland. The company plans a wider rollout in the future.

articles.title: Messe Frankfurt to drive regional expansion with new subsidiary in Saudi Arabia
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Messe Frankfurt is launching a new subsidiary responsible for its business activities in the Kingdom. This subsidiary will offer platforms aligned with the local market.

articles.title: How Do You Smell a Perfume Online?
articles.author: Vivian Morelli
articles.summary: Creed, a Parisian fragrance house, introduced a new scent called "Queen of Silk" last year. This floral fragrance, featuring notes of musk and rose, has gained popularity through social media, influencing purchasing decisions. The fragrance is described as initially overwhelming but eventually developing into an exquisite, warm, and woody scent.

articles.title: How a dot brand top-level-domain enhances control over digital assets and brand consistency
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Companies can now use '.brand' Top Level Domains (TLD) to gain control over their digital identity. This service reduces phishing risks and ensures consistent brand experiences across channels by allowing companies to customize their domain extensions beyond generic options like .com or .net. The aim is to make customer interactions with the brand more secure and reliable.

articles.title: Oppo 'slide-phone' concept explores the future of foldables
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Oppo unveiled a new folding phone concept named 'slide-phone'. The product was created through a collaboration with Japanese design studio, Nendo.

articles.title: McDonald's launching new menu item on Wednesday after successful trial
articles.author: Neil Shaw
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new Sausage Sandwich nationwide on September 10th. The sandwich, featuring an RSPCA assured pork sausage patty, cheddar cheese, and ketchup or brown sauce in a bun, will be available on the Saver Menu for £1.99, or as a bundle with a drink for £2.99. McDonald's is also providing a McChicken Sandwich for £1.39 via their app on September 8th, and offering £3 off orders over £15 from September 12-14.

articles.title: Samsung's premium Galaxy tri-fold foldable mobile could unfold this way, new leak suggests
articles.author: Shaurya Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung is developing a Galaxy Z tri-fold phone, as confirmed earlier this year. A leaked animation from One UI 8 suggests the phone will unfold like a box, with two flaps opening to reveal a large tablet-style device. The design differs from Huawei's Mate XT tri-fold phone in its unfolding mechanism.

articles.title: Want Mediterranean baked goods? Teen fashion? Try these new NJ stores
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Urban Planet opened a new store in Willowbrook Mall on August 8, offering trendy fashion. Ninja Kidz opened in American Dream mall on September 6 with attractions inspired by the YouTube channel Ninja Kids TV. Tatte Bakery opened on September 3 in Morristown, offering Mediterranean-inspired baked goods and beverages.

articles.title: Yuval Tal: 'There has never been a better time to found a startup'
articles.author: CTech
articles.summary: Linguana, a new AI startup founded by Yuval Tal, is developing a global distribution and monetization platform for creators. The company raised $8.5 million and leverages AI to optimize translation, voice, tone, and cultural nuance, enabling creators and enterprises to adapt their content for global audiences.

articles.title: This Is the New 911 Turbo S—Porsche's Most Powerful 911 Ever
articles.author: Asger Risom
articles.summary: Porsche has revealed the 2026 911 Turbo S. This hybrid-powered vehicle boasts 701 horsepower and active aerodynamics. The car's Nürburgring lap time surpasses its predecessor.

articles.title: Dreame Washer&Dryer Set L9 Debuts at IFA 2025 -- Redefining High-End Laundry with Cutting-Edge Tech
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched its premium flagship AI Dual-Inverter Washer & Dryer Set L9 at IFA 2025 in Berlin. The Dreame L9 introduces Dual Inverter Drying, PressFree Steam Care, and FreshLoop Plasma Air Circulation technologies for a reimagined premium laundry experience. Additionally, Dreame showcased other new high-end products, including a garment steamer and a lingerie washer-dryer.

articles.title: Redefining High-End Laundry with Cutting-Edge Tech
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched its premium flagship AI Dual-Inverter Washer & Dryer Set L9 at IFA 2025 in Berlin, featuring Dual Inverter Drying, PressFree Steam Care, and FreshLoop Plasma Air Circulation technologies. The company also showcased a range of high-end new products including the garment steamer and the lingerie washer-dryer.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: University of South Alabama breaks enrollment records
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is expanding its presence by opening mini-stores on 600 college campuses, including 9 in Alabama, specifically targeting Gen Z students. Amtrak has introduced a new Mardi Gras Service connecting New Orleans and Mobile, aiming to enhance regional connectivity and tourism.

articles.title: Dreame Washer&Dryer Set L9 Debuts at IFA 2025 -- Redefining High-End Laundry with Cutting-Edge Tech
articles.author: Shuzhi Society
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched its premium flagship AI Dual-Inverter Washer & Dryer Set L9 at IFA 2025. The Dreame L9 features Dual Inverter Drying, PressFree Steam Care, and FreshLoop Plasma Air Circulation for an enhanced laundry experience.

articles.title: Best shaving cream for men: Get a clean, smooth, and well-groomed look with our top 8 picks
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: The article highlights several shaving creams from different companies, including Truefitt & Hill, Forest Essentials, Taylor of Old Bond Street, The Body Shop, Cremo, Proraso, Barbasol, and L'Occitane. These creams offer various benefits like moisturizing, softening beard hair, preventing irritation, and providing a smooth shave, with some catering to sensitive skin.

articles.title: Ancient Ayurveda Meets Modern Science: The Rebirth of Bringadi Oil
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Bringaras, a new beauty product inspired by the iconic Bringadi Oil, has been launched in New Delhi. It integrates high concentrations of bhringaraj with bio-actives, promising swift and effective results through a blend of Ayurveda and modern science. The launch marks a significant milestone in merging traditional practices with contemporary science.

articles.title: Domino's takes on KFC with new chicken concept, Chick N' Dip
articles.author: Henry Saker-Clark
articles.summary: Domino's is launching Chick 'N' Dip, a new chicken-focused sub-brand, to capitalize on the growing demand for chicken in the UK. The initial launch will occur across the north west of England and Northern Ireland, with plans for wider expansion in the future.

articles.title: 7 Best Sulfate-Free Keratin Hair Care Products for Smooth, Healthy Hair
articles.summary: New sulfate-free and keratin-based hair care formulas offer smoother, more manageable hair. The product line focuses on nourishing, strengthening, and smoothing dry, damaged, or color-treated hair for both men and women, utilizing keratin, soy, and wheat proteins.

articles.title: Domino's Takes on KFC with New Chicken Concept
articles.author: Evening Standard
articles.summary: Pizza Delivery Giant is launching its Chick 'N' Dip sub-brand across the north west of England and Northern Ireland. This represents a new product introduction from the company.

articles.title: Samsung One UI 8 Release Date, Time, Full List Of Supported Devices, Requirements, New Features And More
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch One UI 8, powered by Android 16, with features like a new reminder app and enhanced Samsung Dex. The update is expected to roll out by October, starting with the Samsung Galaxy S25 series, followed by other Galaxy S and Z series devices.

articles.title: D'banj's Cream Platform and Heritage Bank PLC Kickstart 'YNSPYRE' Campaign with N1m Giveaway
articles.author: Linda Ikeji
articles.summary: D'banj's Cream Platform and Heritage Bank PLC have initiated the 'YNSPYRE' campaign. The campaign launch includes a giveaway of N1 million.

articles.title: Google's Nest Hub Max smart screen can now make Zoom calls
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Google is rolling out Zoom on the Nest Hub Max as an early preview for users in the U.S., U.K., Canada, and Australia. This adds a popular teleconferencing platform to the smart display.

articles.title: Artificial intelligence (AI) startup Olgoise announced on the 8th that it will participate in the st..
articles.author: Jeong Hojun
articles.summary: Olgoise is launching its new AI-powered work automation solution, Alli-SaaS, at the Try Everything 2025 startup festival. The Alli-SaaS includes "Ally Works" for task handling via AI conversation and "Ally Dashboard" for creating optimized apps, also it introduces "Deep Research" function. Olgoise plans to support more companies' work innovation through AI, as stated by CEO Lee Chang-soo.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Review: Perfect Balance of Power, Performance
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE launched on September 4, 2025, featuring a lighter design, enhanced durability with Gorilla Glass Victus+ and IP68 rating, and a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display. It boasts a triple camera setup with a 50MP main camera and is powered by the Exynos 2400 chipset, offering improved thermal management and gaming performance, with a promise of seven years of Android updates.

articles.title: How to create a new Google Calendar in 5 simple steps
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google Calendar enables users to schedule meetings, set reminders, and share them. The service allows for managing multiple calendars through a single interface and provides customization options like color labels. While the Google Calendar app is available for mobile devices, creating new calendars must be done through a web browser.

articles.title: Clarifying Services for EEA and UK Customers: Yahoo! Japan's Content Creation Focus
articles.author: Archyde
articles.summary: Yahoo! Japan is expanding its services in the EEA and UK by focusing on localized content creation for platforms like Yahoo! Shopping, Yahoo! News, and Yahoo! Finance. Yahoo! Shopping launched a UK storefront in late 2024 with localized product descriptions and customer support, resulting in a 30% increase in conversion rates.

articles.title: Food for the soul: Why emotion and experience shape branding in Asia
articles.author: Audrey Yow
articles.summary: International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) launched its Immersive Experience Hub in Singapore on July 10. This hub allows brands to test their products in simulated real-life settings using 360-degree video technology, incorporating scent, taste, sound, and touch, to better understand consumer responses. The hub aims to help brands design products that connect with consumers on a cultural and emotional level, adapting to Asia's diverse food preferences.

articles.title: Crunchy Stairs: McDonald's Singapore Unveils Interactive Staircase at Dhoby Ghaut Station
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: McDonald's Singapore has launched its new McCrispy Burger with a marketing campaign that includes an interactive 'McCrispy Crunch' staircase at Dhoby Ghaut MRT station. The staircase simulates the burger's crispiness through sound and light activation with each step. The campaign, developed with OMD, also features social media engagement with influencers and broader out-of-home activations.

articles.title: BLUETTI Launches 9.9 Mega Sale on Lazada: Affordable Backup for Every Home
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: BLUETTI is launching its 9.9 Mega Sale on Lazada from September 8th to 18th. The sale includes discounts of up to 70% off on BLUETTI products.

articles.title: Best shower oil in Australia: The $22 almond oil shoppers say is a ‘fantastic' dupe for $45 cult product
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Thanks to Nature has launched Sweet Almond and Vanilla Shower Oil, a $22 in-shower cleanser, praised for its hydrating effects and almond scent. The shower oil, available in 250mL and 55mL sizes, transforms into a milky foam when wet and is suitable for all skin types. It is available at Woolies.

articles.title: Newsom shows how to lose businesses, insult entrepreneurs
articles.summary: Bed Bath & Beyond, after filing bankruptcy and closing stores, plans to open hundreds of new physical locations. However, the company will not open stores in California, citing overregulation and a risky business environment. Executive Chairman Marcus Lemonis stated that the decision is based on reality, not politics.

articles.title: LG Electronics launches global recruitment portal in 16 languages
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Electronics Inc. launched a unified global on Monday.

articles.title: NEV startups post record August sales
articles.author: LI FUSHENG
articles.summary: XPeng launched its new P7 sedan, securing over 10,000 orders in seven minutes. Nio benefited from the launch of its sub-brand Onvo's L90 in late July, which accounted for almost one-third of Nio's total deliveries in August. Voyah's new Courage SUV garnered 3,000 orders on launch day, and its 2026 Dream MPV received over 10,000 pre-sale orders.

articles.title: OpenAI Backs AI-Made Animated Feature Film
articles.author: Wall Street Journal
articles.summary: Startup is debuting the film 'Critterz' at the Cannes Film Festival. The film will leverage the company's AI tools and resources.

articles.title: CATL Launches Shenxing Pro, Europe's Optimal Solution for E-Mobility at IAA Mobility 2025
articles.author: Brattleboro Reformer
articles.summary: CATL unveiled Shenxing Pro at CATL Open Day.

articles.title: Domino's launches new chicken brand across UK in bid to take on KFC
articles.author: AOL
articles.summary: Domino's is launching Chick 'N' Dip, a new chicken concept, in the North West of England and Northern regions. This move is aimed at capitalizing on the increasing demand for chicken in the UK.

articles.title: Sold Media Launches AI Search Optimization for Real Estate: Get Found on ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Sold Media Group launched its AI Search Optimization service. The service aims to assist developers, brokerages, and real estate brands in achieving higher rankings on AI-driven platforms such as ChatGPT, Google Gemini, and Perplexity.

articles.title: The Pixel 10 Pro XL Does Everything You Need and More video
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL phones provide a superb everyday experience, despite not being the most powerful.

articles.title: Dish TV bets big on smart TVs as part of diversification drive
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: A company is utilizing intern funds to launch a new product or service. The company is also leveraging its established distribution ecosystem for this launch.

articles.title: Samsung To Showcase New A-65% Bespoke AI Washer and 2nd Gen Bespoke AI Laundry Combo at IFA 2025
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil its latest laundry innovations, including the new Bespoke AI, at IFA 2025 in Berlin.

articles.title: Troubled Polestar EV Brand Launches Luxury Sedan
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Polestar revealed the Polestar 5, a luxury EV, five years after debuting the Precept concept car it is based on. The Polestar 5 is a new product introduction from the company.

articles.title: Drew and the Detectives: NYC Mystery Unveils a Haunting Live Experience – Now Launched on Indiegogo.com
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Drew and the Detectives: NYC Mystery Launch, an immersive experience blending magic and sleuthing, is now live. This project invites fans and newcomers to engage with the world of "Drew and the Detectives."

articles.title: Turkish EV maker Togg debuts sedan at Europe's largest car show
articles.author: Daily Sabah
articles.summary: Electric vehicle startup Togg unveiled a new sedan. Togg plans to launch sales in Europe, beginning in Germany, to explore new profit opportunities.

articles.title: Amazon undercuts Samsung with new Galaxy S25 FE launch deal and �240 bonus
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled a new addition to its Galaxy S25 line-up. Shoppers can find the product cheaper elsewhere.

articles.title: Pokemon GO Tales of Transformation Event Reveals Rewards and Gen 9 Debut
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon GO is introducing Dudunsparce. This new event marks the debut of Dudunsparce within the Pokemon GO game.

articles.title: BEAUTY'S BIG SHAKE-UP: ICED MEDIA LAUNCHES SEARCH; TAPS VET EMILY ROSE CAMPBELL!
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: A social media agency for the beauty industry launched a new practice focused on search strategies. This launch addresses a significant shift in how consumers discover beauty products, driven by technologies like Chat GPT and TikTok. The practice aims to help companies adapt to evolving consumer search behavior.

articles.title: Rakuten Symphony validation with Nokia to deliver cloud-native telecom services for operators and enterprises
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: Rakuten Symphony Inc. announced the successful validation of its Rakuten Cloud portfolio, including Rakuten Cloud-Native Platform (CNP) and Rakuten, with Nokia's cloud-native core networks products. The validation followed extensive testing in the Rakuten Mobile Cloud Innovation Lab in Tokyo, indicating a step forward in improving its cloud service offerings.

articles.title: Sony's joyous new variant of the Astro Bot PS5 DualSense controller is available to pre-order ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The "Astro Bot DualSense" is launching next week. It is expected to be popular, following the precedent of its predecessor which quickly sold out.

articles.title: The Polestar 5 electric sedan makes its world debut
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Polestar has debuted its newest model, the Polestar 5, an electric sedan. This new EV represents a departure from previous Polestar products, bringing the company's vision for design, technology, and sustainability to the present.

articles.title: Go Big or Go Home
articles.author: Tushar Kanwar
articles.summary: Redmi is launching the Redmi 15 5G, a budget-friendly phone with a focus on battery life and durability. The phone features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chip, a 7000mAh battery with reverse charging, a 50MP AI dual camera, and is priced starting at ₹14,999.

articles.title: New Cairo's Fizza Just Put Mango on Pizza
articles.summary: Fizza, a company in New Cairo, has launched a new product: mango pizza. This pizza features the standard crust and cheese, topped with slices of mango, creating a sweet-savory combination intended to appeal to a younger audience.
